title: Friends Effing Friends Effing Friends (2016)

cast.name: Julian Wells
cast.character: Carmelena the Italian Woman       (as Suzy McCoppin)

overview: A post-modern romantic comedy about luck and timing in relationships, missed opportunities, unrequited love and how the grass always appears to be greener on the other side.
storyline: Jacob, a freelance copy editor from Los Angeles, struggles with love as he clings to the carefree and selfish ways of his youth. Recklessly blurring the lines of friendship and sex amongst friends, the conflict becomes Man versus Man as each character tries to find love within the group, all while internally battling their own egos to find happiness.
